TEXT.TITLE: GM <GM> GETS 61.1 MLN DLR NAVY CONTRACT
TEXT.BODY: Hughes Aircraft Co, a division of General Motors Corp, has received a 61.1 mln dlr contract for electronic display equipment for U.S., Australian and Spanish surface ships, the Navy said. reuter
